book.synopsis: Graves draws on his two decades living and working on a Texas farm to provide an illuminating overview of Texas life, writing insightfully about the relationship between nature and man, wine-making, chewing tobacco, and cows
book.title_long: From a Limestone Ledge: Some Essays and Other Ruminations About Country Life in Texas
book.dimensions: Height: 8.25 Inches, Length: 5.75 Inches, Weight: 0.75 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
